title: 98/489/EC: Council Decision of 6 July 1998 concerning the conclusion of the International Cocoa Agreement, 1993, on behalf of the Community
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 6 July 1998 concerning the conclusion of the International Cocoa Agreement, 1993, on behalf of the Community (98/489/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The International Cocoa Agreement, 1993, is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorised to designate the person empowered to deposit the instrument of approval on behalf of the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. EDLINGER
(1) OJ L 52, 23.2.1994, p. 25.
